longBusinessSummary: Pokarna Limited engages in quarrying, manufacture, processing, and sale of granites in India. It offers both raw granite blocks and processed granite slabs in various colors and patterns, as well as manufactures and sells quartz surfaces under the Quantra brand. The company also provides random slabs and tiles, as well as cut-to-size products. In addition, it manufactures and sells readymade garments/apparels under the Stanza brand. The company also exports its products to countries, including the United States, Europe, the United Kingdom, Russia, the Middle East, China, and Canada. Pokarna Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Secunderabad, India.
